'''David Carlton''', also known as '''CornerHard''', is a lead software engineer at [[Mojang Studios]]. He was a developer of the {{BE}} software. He is now the technical lead for the Realms client.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20230430194449/https://imgur.com/a/9pqFcSN</ref>
